### Wrangling

1 – FEI
2 – POLI 
3 – MAUA
4 – INSPER
5 – USP SÃO CARLOS
6 – MACKENZIE
7 – ITA
8 - OUTROS

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

insper <- insper_raw %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = -c(1:11),
               names_to = c("question", "school"),
               names_pattern = '(\\w+)(-\\w+)',
               values_to = "answer",
               values_transform = list("score" = as.character()))
  clean_names() %>% glimpse()
  
  ?pivot_longer



```
